abstract: Goffin’s cockatoo named Figaro, hand-raised at Veterinary University of Vienna in Austria, has shown impressive and surprising facility with tool-making and tool use, at level not seen in birds in wild.
snippet: What a bird in Vienna could do with his beak and a few raw materials like bamboo and even cardboard was enough to impress scientists....
lead_paragraph: What a bird in Vienna could do with his beak and a few raw materials like bamboo and even cardboard was enough to impress scientists.
